promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic lion normal-type pokemon wearing white armor. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Leonite, a a chibi cute basic lion normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Mind Jack, Addictive Pollen. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "normal" or "Leonite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, lion-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This adorable creature, known as Leonite, is often found playfully lurking in charming tiny hamlets. It applies its psychic prowess via Mind Jack for pranks and spreads its irresistible Addictive Pollen to attract friends.
